item.title: 美联储古尔斯比主张降息，除非出现过热迹象
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）表示，他预计央行将继续降低利率，以达到既不限制也不促进经济活动的目的。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee said he foresees the central bank continuing to lower rates toward a stance that neither restricts nor promotes economic activity.】

item.title: 在与 "不尊重博士 "签订流媒体协议后，Rumble 一飞冲天
item.description: 在保守派视频流平台 Rumble Inc. 聘请了一位被称为 "不尊重博士 "的网络名人领导 Rumble Gaming 之后，该公司股价周一最高上涨了 17%。【原文：Rumble Inc. shares gained as much as 17% Monday after the conservative video-streaming platform hired an online personality known as Dr Disrespect to lead Rumble Gaming.】

item.title: 特朗普加密货币项目获得孙正义 3000 万美元投资
item.description: 出生于中国、饱受争议的加密货币企业家孙正义向当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的世界自由金融公司（World Liberty Financial）投资了 3000 万美元，成为该去中心化金融项目的最大投资者。【原文：The controversial China-born crypto entrepreneur Justin Sun has invested $30 million in President-elect Donald Trump’s World Liberty Financial, making him the largest investor in the decentralized finance project.】

item.title: 瑞银瞄准富裕女性，重返澳大利亚战略初具规模
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）在近十年前退出澳大利亚市场后，正在重返该市场的财富管理业务，并利用其收购的瑞士信贷（Credit Suisse）专营权再次发起冲击。【原文：UBS Group AG is returning to wealth management in Australia after it exited almost a decade ago, tapping the Credit Suisse franchise it bought to make a renewed charge.】

item.title: 摩根大通扩大能源转型努力，增加煤炭交易
item.description: 摩根大通公司正在积极寻求为提前关闭煤电厂提供资金的交易，加入了正在重新思考如何处理世界上最脏的化石燃料的全球银行的行列。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. is actively pursuing deals to finance the early shutdown of coal plants, joining a list of global banks that are rethinking their approach to handling the world’s dirtiest fossil fuel.】

item.title: 任天堂的新口袋妖怪游戏首秀强于《口袋妖怪GO
item.description: 任天堂公司（Nintendo Co., Ltd.）的新款手机游戏《口袋妖怪》（Pokémon Go）的早期收入比《口袋妖怪Go》发售时的收入高出 70% 以上。即便如此，这款游戏可能仍无法成为任天堂扭转销量持续下滑的大片。【原文：Early revenue for Nintendo Co.’s new mobile Pokémon game is more than 70% higher than what Pokémon Go generated at launch. Even so, it might not be the blockbuster the company needs to reverse persistent sales declines.】

item.title: PE 公司康奈尔称分红并未使快锅制造商破产
item.description: 康奈尔资本有限责任公司（Cornell Capital LLC）对一起指控该私募股权公司帮助其前投资组合公司 Instant Brands 破产的诉讼提出异议。【原文：Cornell Capital LLC is disputing a lawsuit that accuses the private equity firm of helping drive its former portfolio company Instant Brands into bankruptcy.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长马克鲁夫称利率将下降，但对速度持开放态度
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员加布里埃尔-马克鲁夫（Gabriel Makhlouf）表示，欧洲中央银行将降息，但降息的速度和节奏将取决于数据。【原文：European Central Bank interest rates will fall, but the speed and pace will depend on data, according to Governing Council member Gabriel Makhlouf.】

item.title: 联邦贸易委员会和 Meta 将于 4 月 14 日就解散公司的诉讼进行庭审
item.description: Meta Platforms Inc.将于 4 月 14 日开庭审理美国联邦贸易委员会（Federal Trade Commission）提出的长期反垄断诉讼，以拆散该公司。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. faces an April 14 trial in the Federal Trade Commission’s long-running antitrust lawsuit to break up the company.】

item.title: 伊朗官员称欧佩克+几乎没有恢复石油供应的空间
item.description: 伊朗驻欧佩克+组织的代表说，欧佩克+组织几乎没有扭转石油减产的余地，减产引发了美国页岩产业的竞争性供应浪潮。【原文：OPEC+ has little scope to reverse its oil production cuts, which have triggered a wave of rival supply from the US shale industry, Iran’s representative to the group said.】

item.title: 花旗策略师称美联储应暂停行动，反对其经济学家的观点
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. ）的利率策略师表示，美联储应暂停降息，这进一步孤立了该行的经济学家，他们在华尔街其他人士放弃降息半点的呼吁后，仍坚持在 12 月降息半点。【原文：Interest-rate strategists at Citigroup Inc. say the Federal Reserve should pause its interest-rate cuts, further isolating the bank’s economists, who’ve stuck with a call for a half-point move in December long after others on Wall Street abandoned it.】

item.title: 美国煤矿公司皮博迪通过盎格鲁交易瞄准世界钢铁市场
item.description: 随着美国对煤炭需求的减少，皮博迪能源公司（Peabody Energy Corp.【原文：With US demand for coal waning, Peabody Energy Corp., has struck a deal to shift its focus on targeting growth in the global steel market.】

item.title: 马斯克的神经链接公司启动意念控制机械臂研究
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的脑机接口公司Neuralink Corp.表示，该公司正开始测试一种可让瘫痪者控制机械臂的技术。【原文：Elon Musk’s brain-computer interface company, Neuralink Corp., said it is starting to test a technology that could allow paralyzed people to control a robotic arm.】

item.title: 加拿大食品通胀超过工资涨幅，引发工人愤怒
item.description: 加拿大的工资涨幅落后于食品价格的上涨，而食品价格的上涨是导致劳资纠纷的主要原因，劳资纠纷已经颠覆了加拿大的供应链。【原文：Wage gains in Canada are trailing behind rising food prices, a major force driving the labor strife that has upended the country’s supply chains.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉准备应对天然气短缺，政权将责任归咎于 "恐怖分子
item.description: 在一场爆炸导致一家为全国近一半地区提供燃气的工厂瘫痪后，委内瑞拉人正在为严重的厨用燃气短缺做准备。【原文：Venezuelans are bracing for severe cooking-gas shortages after a blast knocked out a plant serving almost half the country.】

item.title: 时尚品牌伊莎贝尔-马兰（Isabel Marant）债券因销售下滑而跳水
item.description: 奢侈时尚品牌伊莎贝尔-马兰（Isabel Marant）的债券周一创下有史以来最大跌幅，此前这家法国公司报告称销售疲软。【原文：Luxury fashion brand Isabel Marant’s bonds posted their largest drop on record on Monday after the French company reported weakening sales.】

item.title: 风险最高的股票大涨，因为历史表明要在派对开始前入场
item.description: 周一，股市中风险最高的一角炙手可热，小盘股罗素 2000 指数（Russell 2000 Index）将创下三年来的首个收盘纪录。华尔街的传说表明，交易员们可能发现了什么。【原文：The riskiest nook of the stock market is hot Monday, with the small-capitalization Russell 2000 Index heading for its first closing record in three years. Wall Street lore says traders may be onto something.】

item.title: 阿根廷 ETF 资金流入创历史新高，交易商看好米莱的努力
item.description: 随着华尔街对哈维尔-米莱伊总统为抑制通货膨胀和扭转多年来地方性预算赤字所做努力的认可，追踪阿根廷股票的交易所交易基金出现了创纪录的资金流入。【原文：An exchange-traded fund tracking Argentine stocks saw record inflows as Wall Street embraces President Javier Milei’s efforts to quell inflation and reverse years of endemic budget deficits.】

item.title: 美国共和党惩罚学校的目标令高校债券减税岌岌可危
item.description: 共和党在 11 月的美国大选中大获全胜，这威胁到了一项帮助美国大学以低廉价格升级校园宿舍和教学楼的特殊减税政策。【原文：A Republican sweep in November’s US election threatens a niche tax break that helps American colleges to upgrade dorms and academic buildings on their campuses for cheap.】

item.title: 前政策制定者称英国央行压制长期利率辩论
item.description: 英国央行前决策者 Gertjan Vlieghe 表示，英国央行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）正在压制一场关于利率走向的关键辩论，此举可能会给货币政策立场带来混乱。【原文：Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey is suppressing a critical debate about where interest rates will settle in a move that may sow confusion about the stance of monetary policy, former BOE policymaker Gertjan Vlieghe said.】

item.title: Hims&Hers股价大涨，特朗普的FDA人选被视为主要盟友
item.description: 亨特布鲁克传媒公司（Hunterbrook Media）称，当选总统唐纳德-特朗普提名马蒂-马卡里（Marty Makary）领导食品与药品管理局，该公司有望成为主要受益者，之后该公司股价大涨18%，有望创下收盘新高。【原文：Hims & Hers Health Inc. shares surged as much as 18% and are on track to close at fresh record after Hunterbrook Media said the company is poised to be a major beneficiary of President-elect Donald Trump’s nomination of Marty Makary to lead the Food and Drug Administration.】

item.title: 纳格尔称欧洲央行不应过快降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）说，通胀率正朝着该行的目标迈进，这将允许该行进一步降息，但官员们不能操之过急。【原文：Inflation that’s headed toward the European Central Bank’s target will allow for more interest-rate cuts, but officials mustn’t rush, Governing Council member Joachim Nagel said.】

item.title: 法国亿万富翁的维旺迪分拆计划未能抑制股价的集团折扣
item.description: 法国亿万富翁文森特-博洛雷（Vincent Bolloré）将维旺迪公司（Vivendi SE）一分为四的计划旨在提升该公司的价值。但迄今为止，这一计划并未奏效，在就拆分计划进行关键投票之前，公司股价已跌至一年来的最低水平。【原文：French billionaire Vincent Bolloré’s project to split Vivendi SE into four aims to boost the firm’s value. It hasn’t so far, with shares spiraling to the lowest level in a year ahead of a crucial vote on the breakup.】

item.title: 特朗普复出，华尔街高层三年后辞职
item.description: 曼哈顿美国联邦检察官达米安-威廉姆斯（Damian Williams）将于 12 月 13 日辞职，这是他在位三年后，随着这个被称为华尔街治安官的办公室领导层向唐纳德-特朗普的新政府过渡。【原文：Manhattan US Attorney Damian Williams will resign on Dec. 13 after a three-year reign, as the leadership of the office known as the sheriff of Wall Street transitions to Donald Trump’s new administration.】

item.title: 莱恩表示，欧洲央行在利率问题上必须持开放态度，逐步采取行动
item.description: 欧洲中央银行首席经济学家菲利普-莱恩认为，欧洲中央银行在降低利率时必须逐步采取行动。【原文：The European Central Bank must act step by step as it lowers interest rates, according to Chief Economist Philip Lane.】

item.title: 欧洲央行森特诺赞成稳步将利率降至 2
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马里奥-森特诺（Mario Centeno）认为，欧洲中央银行应稳步将借贷成本降至 2% 左右。【原文：The European Central Bank should steadily lower borrowing costs to 2% or thereabouts, according to Governing Council member Mario Centeno.】

item.title: Orsted 据称将开始出售英国大型风电场的股份
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Orsted A/S已开始出售计划在英国沿海建设的世界最大风力发电场之一的股份。【原文：Orsted A/S has launched the sale of a stake in one of the world’s biggest wind farms planned off the UK coast, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 研究发现：Uber 式即时支付可促进美国劳动力供应
item.description: 美国国家经济研究局（National Bureau of Economic Research）发表的一项新研究显示，优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：An experiment by Uber Technologies Inc. that offers workers instant access to their earnings had the effect of boosting the supply of labor, with wider implications for US firms, according to a new study published by the National Bureau of Economic Research.】
